item.title: Making a Favicon
item.description: Creating a Multi-Resolution Favicon for Your Website In today’s web environment, having a favicon that looks good across various devices and screen resolutions is crucial. Here’s a simple guide on how to create a multi-size favicon.ico file from a single 128x128 pixel image, using GIMP for resizing and icoutils on Ubuntu Linux for the final ICO creation. Step 0: Creating an Image You have to have a starting point, something to actually make an icon from.
